mapper.update: update carinfo set type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seat = #{seat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gas = #{gas,jdbcType=REAL}, rent = #{rent,jdbcType=REAL}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, type, color, seat, gas, rent, user_id from carinfo
